update PAPERINFO
PAPERNAME = #{papername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPERSTATUS = #{paperstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXAMBEGDATE = #{exambegdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXAMENDDATE = #{examenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

PAPERSHOWMODE = #{papershowmode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAPERCREATOR = #{papercreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PAPERID = #{paperid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
